rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with a foyer that aligns with Vastu by facing the entrance in an auspicious direction (east or north).

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area designed for family gatherings, adjacent to the garden view. Vastu principles suggest placing seating areas towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional dining space integrated with the living room for ease of serving meals, positioned so that the main door opens to a south-east view.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for efficient workflow (sink to cooking zone) and proper ventilation. Vastu recommends positioning the kitchen in the southeast corner, away from the entrance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, ideally located on the north side to promote rest and calm energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with proper storage. Placed in a quiet area following Vastu guidelines for privacy.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated work area that can double as a study, ideally facing east to maximize productivity and positive energy.

openings.description: The main entrance aligns with Vastu principles to allow auspicious energy flow.
Large windows in the living area maximize natural light and provide a scenic view of the garden.
Automated garage door for two-car parking. The placement respects local building norms and ensures ease of access.

rooms.name: Balcony/Deck
rooms.description: Spacious deck offering outdoor relaxation space with garden view, designed in accordance with Vastu for energy balance.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for the family, located conveniently on the first floor.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase providing safe and comfortable access between floors while adhering to local building codes.

rooms.name: Garden Area
rooms.description: Large garden space designed for relaxation, recreation, and social gatherings. Vastu principles suggest including water features to balance the energy.
